### Multicollector Noble Gas Mass Spectrometer and Ultra-high Vacuum Gas Extraction Line

#### Announcement Summary

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids for the supply of a Multicollector Noble Gas Mass Spectrometer and an Ultra-high Vacuum Gas Extraction Line to Natural Resources Canada (NRCan).

#### Key Details

*   **Tender Number:** WS3780908453
*   **Tender Title:** Multicollector Noble Gas Mass Spectrometer and Ultra-high Vacuum Gas Extraction Line
*   **Bid Closing Date:** January 9, 2023 at 14:00 EST
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End User:** Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
*   **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

#### Contract Description

NRCan requires a Multicollector Noble Gas Mass Spectrometer and an Ultra-high Vacuum Gas Extraction Line for the Natural Resources sector. The successful bidder must provide:

*   The Multicollector Noble Gas Mass Spectrometer
*   The Ultra-high Vacuum Gas Extraction Line
*   Operating Software
*   Comprehensive training, installation, and support
*   All necessary documentation
*   A one-year warranty including maintenance and support services

#### Contact Information

Renee Lepage
renee.lepage@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note that the bid closing date and all required supporting documentation and bidding submission must be submitted by the deadline mentioned. All bids received after the deadline will be declared non-responsive.
